title: Grim Inception
description: Witness the dawn of a new hero.Attorney Henry Haas thought he had nothing left to lose. Wealthy from blood money, he works for the most ruthless crime boss in Redborogh, Oregon. But when innocent blood spills, Henry isn't the only one wanting revenge.Grim Inception is a short story prequel to Grim Ambition. Be here for the beginning of Grim's dark justice.
author: Jennifer Reinfried
